## Events.TrashcanOpen class

Notifies listeners when the trashcan is opening or closing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class TrashcanOpen extends UiBase 
```
**Extends:** [UiBase](./blockly.events_namespace.uibase_class.md)
